title: [HELP] Something To Do With Drivers | LoL Won't Open
body:
Can anyone help me with this... I just went in to a match and it wouldn't let me do so, because of this message. I know the apparent drivers need updating, but they are updated?

Anyone good with this type of thing, could you please help me? :P

replies.body:
First thing to note, the boards support uploading of an image file. Create the print-screen yourself next time, it's more polite and less dangerous.

And that seems like an error with DirectX. If you're certain that you've updated your graphics drivers, then you can try reinstalling DirectX. If you're on Windows 7, download it from [here](http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows7/products/features/directx-11).

Best of luck.
